useCase.name: Adding a New Allergy
useCase.description: User (Admin) adds a new allergy information.

mainSequence.step: Admin asks the HealthCare System to add a new allergy.
HealthCare System displays the form for adding a new allergy to the Admin.
Admin submits the form including allergy name, code, and description to the HealthCare System.
HealthCare System confirms the addition of the allergy and displays a successful submission message to the Admin.
